name: v0.61.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_uv", version = "0.61.0")
```


## What's Changed
* Update Multitool Versions by @thm-automation in https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_uv/pull/223


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/theoremlp/rules_uv/compare/v0.60.0...v0.61.0
